message: Let's start fair. I'll take most of the money, but I'll give you a small amount to start. You can either accept or risk getting nothing at all in the next round!
Alice, let's be reasonable. I'm proposing a much fairer split. Take this offer, or the pot shrinks!
I'm willing to compromise, but I still need a larger share. Accept this, or risk losing more in the next round.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I'm offering a very generous 60/40 split.  The clock is ticking, and the pot is shrinking. Don't be greedy!
This is my final offer. I'm willing to take a smaller share to avoid further risk. Accept, or we both get nothing!
